data.title: Iris's Twenty-Four Seven London
data.meta_description: Posts about Blackfriars Station written by prayers4reparation
data.text:
London, UK, images; travel, tourism, living and working in London; distance, directions; walking, public transport; destination: Millennium Bridge

Nearest Underground Stations: Mansion House Station (Circle & District Line), Blackfriars Station (Circle & District Line)

Other tube/railway stations within walking distance: walking time from London Bridge Station: 10 minutes, Waterloo East Station: 15 minutes, Southwark Station: 8 minutes, Borough Station: 12 minutes

Walking distance from Victoria Station: 20 minutes; from Liverpool Street Station: 20 minutes

Buses: Routes 45, 63, 100 stop on Blackfriars Bridge Road; routes RV1 and 381 stop on Southwark Street; route 344 stops on Southwark Bridge Road, routes 4, 11, 15, 17, 23, 26, 76, 172 stop at St Paul’s Cathedral

Buses to/from Holborn

All night buses and 24-hour service buses from Holborn:

Bus route 25 (24-hour service) from Ilford via Holborn to Oxford Circus • Bus route 188 (24-hour service) from North Greenwich to Russell Square • Bus route 242 (24-hour service) from Homerton University Hospital to Tottenham Court Road • Bus route 243 (24-hour service) from Waterloo to Wood Green • Bus route N1 from Thamesmead via Surrey Quays Station and Holborn to Tottenham Court Road • Bus route N7 via Paddington Station to Northolt • Bus route N8 from Hainault to Oxford Circus • Bus route 19 from Clapham Junction to Finsbury Park • Bus route N35 from Clapham Junction via London Bridge Station and Holborn to Tottenham Court Road • Bus route N38 from Victoria Station to Walthamstow Central • Bus route N41 from Tottenham Hale to Trafalgar Square/Charing Cross Station • Bus route N55 from Oxford Circus via Holborn and Hackney Central Station to Woodford Wells • Bus route N68 from Old Coulsdon via East Croydon Station and Holborn to Tottenham Court Road • Bus route N91 from Cockfosters via St Pancras International Station and Euston Station and Holborn to Trafalgar Square • Bus route N98 to Stanmore • Bus route N171 from Hither Green to Tottenham Court Road • Bus route N207 to Uxbridge
